49 #define __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(a,b,type) \
50  virtual void set ## a (DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context, type value); \
51  virtual bool b ## IsReadOnly (DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context); \
52  virtual type get ## a (DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context);
53 
54 #define __DS_DEPTH_MAP_DEFINE(map) \
55  unsigned int get## map ##ByteCount() const; \
56  unsigned int get## map ##AllocatedByteCount() const; \
57  unsigned int get## map ##PixelCount() const; \
58  void set## map ##ByteCount(unsigned int); \
59  void set## map ##AllocatedByteCount(unsigned int); \
60  void set## map ##PixelCount(unsigned int);
61 
62 #define __DS_DEPTH_MAP_DEFINE_MEMBER(map) \
63  unsigned int map ##ByteCount; \
64  unsigned int map ##AllocatedByteCount; \
65  unsigned int map ##PixelCount;
66

295 #ifdef SKFILTER
296  // Controls the confidence filter
297  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(EnableFilter1, enableFilter1, bool)
298  // Controls the Pixel Density filter
299  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(EnableFilter2, enableFilter2, bool)
300  // Controls the Epar smoother filter
301  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(EnableFilter3, enableFilter3, bool)
302  // Controls the Flying Pixel removal filter
303  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(EnableFilter4, enableFilter4, bool)
304  // Controls the Tap Filter
305  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(EnableFilter5, enableFilter5, bool)
306  // Controls the Confidence Tap Filter
307  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(EnableFilter6, enableFilter6, bool)
308  // Controls the Flying Pixel removal filter - second pass
309  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(EnableFilter8, enableFilter8, bool)
310  // Controls the Shampoo Filter
311  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(EnableFilter9, enableFilter9, bool)
312  // Controls the confidence YMax
313  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter1Parameter1, filter1Parameter1, int32_t)
314  // Controls the confidence CY2min
315  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter1Parameter2, filter1Parameter2, int32_t)
316  // Controls the confidence SureBadPix
317  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter1Parameter3, filter1Parameter3, int32_t)
318  // Controls the confidence SureGoodPix
319  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter1Parameter4, filter1Parameter4, int32_t)
320  // Controls the Pixel Density MaxBadNeighbors
321  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter2Parameter1, filter2Parameter1, int32_t)
322  // Controls the Epar Alpha
323  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter3Parameter1, filter3Parameter1, float)
324  // Controls the Epar Beta
325  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter3Parameter2, filter3Parameter2, float)
326  // Controls the range over which Epar has an effect
327  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter3Parameter3, filter3Parameter3, int)
328  // Controls the Flying Pixel Delta
329  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter4Parameter1, filter4Parameter1, int32_t)
330  // Controls the Tap Filter Max Delta Depth
331  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter5Parameter1, filter5Parameter1, int32_t)
332  // Controls the Confidence Tap Filter MinIR
333  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter6Parameter1, filter6Parameter1, int32_t)
334  // Controls the Confidence Tap Filter MaxIR
335  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter6Parameter2, filter6Parameter2, int32_t)
336  // Controls the Confidence Tap Filter MinIRDeltaDepthNoise
337  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter6Parameter3, filter6Parameter3, int32_t)
338  // Controls the Confidence Tap Filter MaxIRDeltaDpethNoise
339  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter6Parameter4, filter6Parameter4, int32_t)
340  // Controls the Flying Pixel Delta - second pass
341  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter8Parameter1, filter8Parameter1, int32_t)
342  // Controls the Shampoo filter iter
343  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter9Parameter1, filter9Parameter1, int)
344  // Controls the Shampoo filter lambda
345  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter9Parameter2, filter9Parameter2, float)
346  // Controls the Shampoo filter sigma
347  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter9Parameter3, filter9Parameter3, float)
348  // Controls the Shampoo filter tau
349  __DS_DEPTH_PROPERTY_DEFINE(Filter9Parameter4, filter9Parameter4, float)
350 #endif // SKFILTER
